sentences.cn: 浓密的树叶覆盖着群山.

sentences.en: Different foliage colour deviants are readily found.
sentences.cn: 叶色不同程度的反常是很容易识别的.

sentences.en: Dig it up once the foliage has died down.
sentences.cn: 叶子掉光后就把它挖出来。

sentences.en: Flowers on variegated branches yield offspring that have variegated foliage.
sentences.cn: 有斑驳的枝条上的花,产生有变异叶片的后代.

sentences.en: High overhead , the tall trees there made a continuous roof of foliage.
sentences.cn: 那里有几颗高大的树木,茂密的枝叶在高空中形成一片连绵不断的顶.

sentences.en: Most trees lose their foliage in winter.
sentences.cn: 大多数树木在冬天落叶.

sentences.en: My flower arrangement needs more foliage.
sentences.cn: 我的插花作品还得多要些枝叶.

sentences.en: The fall foliage glowed red and yellow in the morning sunlight.
sentences.cn: 树叶在秋日的晨曦中泛出红黄色的光。

sentences.en: The foliage was in its utmost luxuriance.
sentences.cn: 树叶正处于最茂盛的时期.

sentences.en: The foliage was soft and feathery.
sentences.cn: 叶子如羽毛般轻软柔和。

sentences.en: The path was completely covered by the dense foliage.
sentences.cn: 小路被树叶厚厚地盖了一层.

sentences.en: The trees renew their foliage every spring.
sentences.cn: 树木每年都重新长出叶子.

sentences.en: The trees renew their foliage every year.
sentences.cn: 树木每年都重新长出叶子。

sentences.en: There were two very large oak trees in front of our house with wide spreading branches and luxuriant foliage.
sentences.cn: 我们家门口有两棵枝繁叶茂的大橡树。

sentences.en: Urea is commonly used as the source of nitrogen in foliage sprays.
sentences.cn: 尿素作为氮素给源普遍地应用于叶面喷布.

trans.tran_cn: 植物的叶子（总称），叶子及梗和枝，树叶
trans.tran_en: The leaves of a plant are referred to as its foliage
